Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

This is work in progress.

I would like to automate the generation of a few of these pairs of types: degree/natDegree, degree/trailingDegree, natDegree/natTrailingDegree.
I already have an almost complete translation of MonoidAlgebra --> AddMonoidAlgebra in the Basic file.

Today I chose PR 12429 for discussion!
